restaurants.name: Tavern in the Square
restaurants.description: Sports bar with American fare and a lively atmosphere, perfect for pre or post-game meals.
restaurants.bruinsSpecial: B's Burger: Black and gold themed burger available on game days

restaurants.name: The Fours
restaurants.description: Classic sports bar with memorabilia-covered walls, serving pub grub and drinks.
restaurants.bruinsSpecial: Bobby Orr's Favorite: A sandwich named after the Bruins legend

restaurants.name: Halftime Pizza
restaurants.description: No-frills pizzeria offering slices and whole pies, popular among game-goers.
restaurants.bruinsSpecial: The Bruins Special: A pizza topped with black olives and golden bell peppers

restaurants.name: North Street Grille
restaurants.description: Cozy spot known for its creative breakfast and brunch options.
restaurants.bruinsSpecial: Power Play Pancakes: Hockey-puck shaped chocolate chip pancakes

restaurants.name: Bova's Bakery
restaurants.description: 24-hour Italian bakery offering pastries, sandwiches, and pizza.
restaurants.bruinsSpecial: Bruin's Bear Claw: A black and gold themed pastry

restaurants.name: Boston Public Market
restaurants.description: Indoor market featuring local food vendors, ideal for a quick, diverse meal.
restaurants.bruinsSpecial: Various vendors offer game day specials

restaurants.name: Union Oyster House
restaurants.description: Historic seafood restaurant, the oldest continuously operating restaurant in the US.
restaurants.bruinsSpecial: The Bruin's Bowl: A seafood chowder served in a bread bowl

restaurants.name: Pauli's
restaurants.description: Popular sandwich shop known for its lobster rolls and other New England specialties.
restaurants.bruinsSpecial: The Big Bad Bruin: A massive, game day only sandwich

restaurants.name: Regina Pizzeria
restaurants.description: Iconic Boston pizzeria serving brick-oven pies since 1926.
restaurants.bruinsSpecial: The Hat Trick: A three-topping pizza deal on game days

restaurants.name: Causeway Restaurant & Bar
restaurants.description: Sports bar right across from TD Garden, known for its game day atmosphere.
restaurants.bruinsSpecial: Spoked-B Nachos: A massive nacho platter perfect for sharing

restaurants.name: Night Shift Brewing Lovejoy Wharf
restaurants.description: Brewery and kitchen offering craft beers and elevated pub fare.
restaurants.bruinsSpecial: The Black & Gold Ale: A special brew on tap during hockey season

restaurants.name: Tip Tap Room
restaurants.description: Upscale pub known for its diverse selection of wines, beers, and wild game dishes.
restaurants.bruinsSpecial: The Bruins Board: A charcuterie board featuring local meats and cheeses

restaurants.name: Ward 8
restaurants.description: Cocktail bar and restaurant offering craft drinks and New American cuisine.
restaurants.bruinsSpecial: The Penalty Box: A spicy cocktail served in a hockey-themed glass

restaurants.name: Conor Larkin's Grill & Tap
restaurants.description: Casual pub with a great selection of beers and classic bar food.
restaurants.bruinsSpecial: The Bruin's Irish Coffee: A boozy coffee drink perfect for cold game nights
